result.markdown:
---
title: "RStudio/Bash Struggles (cont.)"
author: "Kathleen Durkin"
date: "2023-10-12"
categories:
    - onboarding
---


I think I may have fixed the issue running bash code chunks in Rmd files! Included the following:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(engine.path=list(bash='C:/Program Files/Git/git-bash.exe'))
```
:::


And now, while I still don't seem to get any output when I try to run individual code chunks by pressing the "play" button in the top right corner, knitting the document works! I still haven't figured out how to permanently set the default shell script for running bash code chunks from Rmd files, so for now I guess I'll just have to include that YAML block in any Rmd file I'm working in.
